args: How about these medicinal herbs...\nOh, I've already tried mixing these.
Then next I'll try these aromatic herbs.\nThe component list is...
It's Halloween, Sylas! Put down the books\nand beakers and science-y stuff and try to\nENJOY yourself for once!
Seriously, if that frown was any more\npronounced birds could land on it.\nYou must be freaking out again, huh?
Oh dear. No, lad. I'm the one who's sorry.
Oh, FINE! In that case, I suppose we'll just\nhave to give you an extra-special, \nnever-before-seen treat from us.
Yeah, a treat! You know, the thing that's\nnot a trick? Anyway, here—we picked\nthese 'cause we know you like strawberries.
You're pretty much acting like you do when\nyou're at max capacity, so seriously try to\ntake care of yourself, okay?
Yeah, what he said! Sometimes when\nyou're all caught up in your own head,\nit's better to let loose and get it all out.
So if you ever get to a good stopping point,\njust come on out. Oh, and you've got this\nlittle fella waitin' for you too.
Don't push yourself too hard, Mister Sylas!
I made them all worry about me again.\nOh, but I am pathetic.
Thank you for everything, little Sylas...\nBe well...my child...

I've been researching so nobody would
have to suffer as my grandfather did,
and I swore that I would attain my goal
no matter the cost.
But can someone as pathetic as me\never do what I set out to do?
I've worked late into the night again.
I'm sure the party's long over and I've\nhurt Luca and his friends' feelings.
Sorry to bother you at this hour,\nbut this man—
You were working on some kind of\nhealing aromatic, right?!
Please, you must use it to save my son!\nI beg you! I'll pay anything!
I'm listening. Please remain calm and\ntell me exactly what has transpired.
My son has been sick for some time,\nbut his condition took a turn for the worse\nand the doctors have all but given up.
You're the only one I can count on now.\nPlease, you must save my boy!
I'm sorry, but I could not save him.\nWords cannot express my sorrow.
No apologies necessary. You're the\nreason my pappy was able to pass on\npeacefully and without pain.
(What will I do if he gets his hopes up\nand I let another person down?)
Thank you for waiting.\nI have more oil right here.
No, that's all right. My mother...\nWell, she's passed.
Why are you hesitating?! They're waiting\nfor you and your healing skills!
But my aromatic's not yet complete.
Do you remember the party? All those\npeople you met? You've already saved\ncountless lives!
And that's because you didn't give up!
So stop lingering on the dead and focus on\nthose you've saved! Face forward, my boy!
For if you're so afraid of failure that you\nstop moving forward, you won't save\nanyone at all!
I swore to keep improving until I\ncomplete my healing aromatic!
Take me to your son at once.
His breathing has calmed.\nI believe he will be okay.
(I managed to save someone today.\nThis is a happy occasion indeed.)
